content.heading: Ordered Lists
paragraphs: Ordered lists use <ol> with <li> for items, numbered or lettered automatically.

content.heading: Type Attribute
paragraphs: The type attribute changes item markers: '1' (numbers), 'A' (uppercase letters), 'a' (lowercase letters), 'I' (uppercase Roman numerals), 'i' (lowercase Roman numerals).

content.heading: Start Attribute
paragraphs: The start attribute sets the starting number, e.g., start="50":

content.heading: Nested Lists
paragraphs: Nest ordered lists within <li> for sub-lists:
